"Oof--! P-peon!?": "<%me>! Perfect timing! Don't let her go!"
"D-don't move, Huey! One step closer, and I'll blow you to smithereens!"
"Then tell me, Claris Claes. Why do you continue to run?"
"Because YOU keep chasing me! I told you to leave me alone!!"
"What do you want with me!? I'm just a...! just a...!"
"SILENCE, FOOL! Who do you take me for!?"
"Did you really think the great Huey would abandon a damsel in distress!?"
"But I'm... I'm just a replica. A phony. A fake..."
"This staff, my title, my power... everything! Everything was fake! I'm an impostor. I don't... deserve any of it."
"...You think so too, don't you, peon? That I'm a worthless impostor..."
"1. Not at all."
"2. ...perhaps."
"Hah hah! Obsessing over trivial matters? This isn't like you, Claris Claes!!"
"Not that I don't understand how you feel, but allow me to join in saying you're sorely mistaken!"
"...indeed, that may be the case. You have little to offer the way you are now."
"But that's only because you have decided to be worthless!"
"...Listen up, Claris Claes. And listen well."
"Those 'things' are nothing more..."
"...than your body doubles!"
"A-are you nuts!?"
"You saw them, Huey!! No matter how you cut it, th... th-they're my clones!"
"And I am too! I'm nothing more than a clone!"
"...I dug through the archives, and I found out... that my life has no value or meaning. I'm just a clone..."
"Oh, so you knew about the clones. Why didn't you say so? In that case, do not avert your eyes from the truth!"
"I will say it once more! They are your body doubles... and they are NOT your equal!"
"If they were your clones, then that would mean I've killed you countless times! I refuse to believe it!"
"Therefore, they are not you! They are Luther's creation, our common enemy!"
"With that clear, answer me, Claris Claes. Are you now my enemy, or my ally?"
"...I attacked you. I did those terrible things..."
"I said those terrible words..."
"...and after all that, Huey... you would still forgive me?"
"A foolish question!"
"Ahaha...haha...ha... Huey, you're such an idiot!"
